alert.note: Alert for Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:54PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Dona Ana and northwestern El Paso Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 153 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Santa Teresa, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph with some patchy blowing dust possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West El Paso, Santa Teresa, Anthony, Vado, Sunland Park, Canutillo, Berino, Westway, Chamberino, Vinton, La Union and Union Pacific Intermodal Terminal. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 156 and 163. Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
